title: Predictive modeling of BOD throughout wastewater treatment: A generalizable machine learning approach for improved effluent quality
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00111G, Paper
offir inbar, Moni Shahar, Dror Avisar
Biochemical oxygen demand (BOD) is one of the most sensitive and essential indicators of wastewater quality. However, today, BOD detection methods require considerable effort and time, resulting in management and...
